title: Who’s the Oni!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Roar roar~. Kanata is an Oni, Kanata will eat you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You-chan! Throw the beans, the beans!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I feel like the Oni is way too cute. I think I’d like more of a.... feeling of imminent danger that makes me go like “I have to throw the beans!”....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Y-, you called out my Oni performance.... Kanata Oni has already been defeated without any beans.... Kanata will go home for this year<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Waah! I-, I’m sorry! Your Oni just looked too kind, Kanata-san. Will you let me try being an Oni?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You will, You-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah. I’ll be super serious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeh, Kanata is scared already. Don’t chase me down, okay? Kanata doesn’t think that Kanata can escape from your Oni, You-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’ll really chase you down, you know? You have to run with your all and throw beans at me, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
